text: 19 is the first album by Adele. It was released on 28 January 2008. It went straight to number one in the United Kingdom's record charts. The album was produced by Jim Abbiss, Mark Ronson, and Eg White. ==Track listing== # "Daydreamer" # "Best for Last" # "Chasing Pavements" # "Cold Shoulder" # "Crazy for You" # "Melt My Heart to Stone" # "First Love" # "Right as Rain" # "Make You Feel My Love" # "My Same" # "Tired" # "Hometown Glory" ==Credits and personnel== * Vocals \- Adele ==References== Category:2008 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Adele albums Category:Pop albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: 19 (album)
